roleset.name: imagine, again
roleset.note: REIMAGINE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reimagine' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. Comparison to 'imagine.' (from reimagine.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: The county sees the empty space as an opportunity *PRO* to "reimagine" and "brand" Crystal City as an attractive destination.
